PersonalStatement.text: Kathleen Mendez, born on 1973-03-28, is a Female based in Jeffreystad, Panama. She is Divorced and holds Filipino nationality. Currently working at Lee Inc.

WorkExperience.text: Systems Administrator at Quinn, Carter and Murphy from 2006 to 2020.
Senior Financial Analyst at Lee Inc, 2023 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Bachelor's in Civil Engineering from Taras Shevchenko National University of Kyiv
Master's in Engineering from Taylor's University

PersonalSkills.text: Problem-solving: Skilled in troubleshooting and optimizing complex systems.
Technical Proficiency: Expert in cloud computing and distributed systems.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, she enjoys running marathons.
